an5.249:1.3: Asuci, duggandha, sappatibhaya, valanam amanussanam avaso, bahuno janassa arodana—
an5.249:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava sivathikaya.
an5.249:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancime adinava sivathikupame puggale.
an5.249:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asucina kayakammena samannagato hoti;
an5.249:3.1: Tassa asucina kayakammena samannagatassa, asucina vacikammena samannagatassa, asucina manokammena samannagatassa papako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.249:4.1: Tamenam asucina kayakammena samannagatam, asucina vacikammena samannagatam, asucina manokammena samannagatam pesala sabrahmacari araka parivajjanti.
an5.249:5.1: So asucina kayakammena samannagato, asucina vacikammena samannagato, asucina manokammena samannagato sabhagehi puggalehi saddhim samvasati.
an5.249:5.3: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, sivathika valanam amanussanam avaso;
an5.249:6.1: Tamenam asucina kayakammena samannagatam, asucina vacikammena samannagatam, asucina manokammena samannagatam pesala sabrahmacari disva khiyadhammam apajjanti:
an5.249:6.2: ‘aho vata no dukkham ye mayam evarupehi puggalehi saddhim samvasama’ti.
an5.249:6.4: Seyyathapi sa, bhikkhave, sivathika bahuno janassa arodana;
an5.249:6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava sivathikupame puggale”ti.
